DEMO_903_MSG_001: ̂Tico! You came all the way out here. Did something happen?
DEMO_903_MSG_002:
̂Yes. I found a very big clue! But first things first...
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_003_1:
̂Could you tell ȁ and his friend here how it all happened?
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_015:
̂It's a white monolith, just like the white Incarnus.... legend says that kings from all generations are enshrined there.
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_003_2: ̂They're helping me find the Incarnii but I brought them here without really explaining the situation.
DEMO_903_MSG_016: ̂They're all scattered fin this world rom west to north. And I believe there are many of them.
DEMO_903_MSG_004:
̂Ahh! Thank you so much for your cooperation. I'm Lutra, in charge or guarding this village.
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_004_1:
̂We are looking for our 2 kings and their 10+ escort beasts. They're no where to be found.
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_008:
̂5 years ago.... Come to think of it, the break world was created around that time too.
ā
So the Incarnii were in a crisis, just like we were.
DEMO_903_MSG_005: ̂I don't recall when that was but a phantom gate suddenly appeared and opened on some desolate planet.
DEMO_903_MSG_006:
̂The demons appeared one after the other and the gIncarnii fought so hard to keep them in their realm.
ā
I was here when that happened, watching over everyone and looking after the village.
ā
And then one day.... the demons and the incarnii suddenly vanished!
DEMO_903_MSG_007:
̂... I don't have a clue to what happened. Incarnii cannot be killed easily.
ā
So they have to be here some where! But they've been lost for 5 years now.
DEMO_903_MSG_009: ̂Hey, ȁ. Could you show that noble weapon to Lutra?
DEMO_903_MSG_010: ̂Oh! That is definitely Joker's artifact! Where did you find that?
DEMO_903_MSG_011_1: ̂We found it on a planet called Break World, not so far from the battle grounds of Incarnii and demons.
DEMO_903_MSG_011_2:
̂Hey Lutra, we have a favor to ask. Could we borrow Ra's mirror?
ā
To identify the beasts' whereabouts in the Break World, we need that mirror.
DEMO_903_MSG_012:
̂Ra's mirror huh. It is indeed here....
ā
But the mirror lost all its power after the King vanished.....
DEMO_903_MSG_013: ̂Oh! But you know what.... if we seek the divine protection from the monoliths, we might be able to restore the mirror's power.
DEMO_903_MSG_014:
̂The monoliths of many shapes and sizes that are scattered outside of the village right?
ā
DEMO_903_MSG_017:
̂Yes! Pray to 15 of the monoliths to restore te mirror power!
ā
It is said that anyone who prays to 15 monoliths from their heart will gain divine protetion from the Kings of all generations.
DEMO_903_MSG_018: ̂I guess we should give it a try. I'll help you out, ȁ!
